lines.text: Do you hope to safe your life with this bravado?
No Ming. My only hope to get close enough...
to put my hands on your throat!
Take her to the women's quarters!
Your majesty has many ships and soldiers, but there's only one Dale Arden. No doubt Prince Barin would be glad to exchange Captain Torch for her.
You're Captain or your bride, sire.
You, you! Don't you realize that with Dr. Zarkov in possesion of my labratory, he is more powerful than I am in my own Kingdom?
Our misssion is not only to save the world, but the universe as well.

[on viewscreen]
The universe? I am the universe.
